html:
5.2.17  9:08 pm   how to be determined?

     you usually don't have a choice

5.2.17  9:00 pm   what are your thoughts on bedtimes?

     they are influenced mainly by 3 things. the time you last woke up, the time you previously went to bed, and the time you are supposed to wake up next

5.2.17  8:41 pm   what would you do differently if you were famous world wide? Like actual famous with millions of fans etc

     nothing fundamentally differently. although there will be live shows, regardless

     the truth

     wet

     i have not read it

     i'm doing my best

     oh hell yeah
5.2.17  8:06 pm   String cheese: yes or no

     probably, and also getting right to the song list

5.2.17  7:46 pm   yo its the person who questioned why your entire body catches on fire while reading youtube comments, and i have done what you suggested and 1) oh. wow 2) is that what the questions page is like as well

     no, it's a bit more reasonable

5.2.17  7:45 pm   How's your faith in humanity?

     fine, good, etc
5.2.17  7:45 pm   Any book recommendations?

5.2.17  7:39 pm   should i walk faster to catch an earlier bus or should i walk way slower to catch a later one. what's the best way to avoid standing at the bus stop for ages?

     leave your house at the right time to walk at your normal pace and be right on time for the bus. if you don't know how to predict the bus, check online

5.2.17  7:35 pm   Can we agree timezones are weird?

     time is weird

5.2.17  7:29 pm   at the beginning of the video do you mention how people wanted more history videos, so you decided to do all of them in one, or do you just jump into it?

     i jump through the entire thing

5.2.17  7:26 pm   are you ever afraid that nothing is real

     if nothing is real than what the hell have we been using the word real for

     and we are all just robots

     we surely are robots, although we are much better robots than any of the robots we have invented so far
5.2.17  6:56 pm   will hotewig be out before may 12th?

5.2.17  6:55 pm   i get this thing where i try recording a song (whilst writing it) but i keep just listening to the part i made because i don't know how i should move forward. and i'll listen to it up to the point at that i don't like it anymore. any thoughts and/or tips for moving forward?

     after experimenting both ways, i firmly believe that i can get much better results if i finish writing the song entirely before recording it. not micro-managing all the instruments choices and parts, but just the melody/chords and other core details, and most importantly the entire road map, beginning to end. do not leave any sections in question. in the studio you are free to have much more fun with sound choices etc if you don't have to worry about where the song goes next, if that's already planned out. this is just in my experience. some people thrive on writing in the studio. i have tried both ways and nowadays i firmly believe that what works best for me is to write to the end first, before even touching the recording.

5.2.17  6:53 pm   why did you only say thank you for your webby award for weird?

     i did not win a webby award

5.2.17  6:47 pm   Do you like matzo ball soup?

     i've heard of it but i don't really know what it is

5.2.17  6:28 pm   Can you spell cabbage?

     i think so

5.2.17  6:13 pm   is being fun randomly?

     sure

      is being random funny?

5.2.17  5:50 pm   why. why do you work so hard

     most people think i don't work at all
5.2.17  5:49 pm   what makes you laugh?

5.2.17  5:44 pm   Are you doing the history of one quarter of the world?

     not exactly

5.2.17  5:12 pm   Do you think that we are in an age of post scarcity information and that it's all about presentation now?

     we are getting there, but there is still a ways to go

5.2.17  5:12 pm   What's a clever way to stand out?

     become president of the united states

5.2.17  5:09 pm   do you not collaborate because you think you can't, or because you don't want to? bc if you'd want to but you don't do it bc you think you can't that would be a shame bc i'm sure you can do anything you want. also if you dont know where to start just stand somewhere and ppl will come to you and collab with you.

     i felt guilty for years because everyone (like you) makes it sound like you are 'supposed' to collaborate. but it just never worked, and never made sense. i was very confused about this because everyone always pressures you to collaborate. until finally one day i realized that some people actually work best all by themselves, and that's ok. i can't describe how relieved i was when i realized that, and i became instantly focused and productive, where as before i was just sad guilty and confused. i hope that makes sense

5.2.17  5:07 pm   do you face your fears or cower away

     i like to do a little of both

5.2.17  4:56 pm   which one is better, being praised or being criticized?

     they both have advantages and disadvantages

5.2.17  4:55 pm   My boyfriend likes pancakes more than waffles, but it's common knowledge that waffles are superior than pancakes (i.e. versatility, carries more syrup etc). How can I gently let him know he's wrong without saying he's stupid

     send pancakes and waffles to starving children in nigeria and see which ones they eat

5.2.17  4:53 pm   do u consider yourself to be a very good entity that enjoys maple syrup

     i never thought of it that way

5.2.17  4:45 pm   is HOTEWIG going to be in chronological order

     ah yes, that's one of the reasons it drove me insane and took so long to write
5.2.17  4:19 pm   when is the history of the world video coming?
5.2.17  4:17 pm   could you do another history of ______ video? i really liked the first one.

5.2.17  4:11 pm   how to do a money music gig

     get there on time, know your setup, dress how they want you to dress, know the material, and execute it passionately, within the guidelines required. and at the end if they forget to pay you, politely remind them. that is how to do the gig, not how to get the gig. the way you get the gig is someone recommended you after working with you on a previous gig, in which you did all of the above. i hope that makes sense

5.2.17  3:53 pm   would you ever get personal on any platform?

     i try to get as personal as possible on every platform. me and my entire audience is people
5.2.17  3:48 pm   would you use (or did you use already) microtonality in your music?

5.2.17  3:47 pm   i feel like i am completely fucking crazy, like not mentally ill but just completely weird when i'm alone. how the hell do i find someone who finds craziness endearing, and not just offputting

     the world largely finds craziness endearing and wonderful. it also sells. if you aren't seeing results from it, then you just have to adjust the presentation slightly. but if you already have the craziness, then i guarantee you are 90% of the way to wild success, and fortune. people who don't have craziness usually have to work much harder

5.2.17  3:46 pm   Why did not you make a 404 error page?

     custom 404 pages say to me: we spent more time desigining this fuck up page than trying to fix the problem

     average bandit

5.2.17  3:40 pm   what shall i do if i want to get outta this place but cannot

     well if you believe you can't leave, then stay i guess

     hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha let me check

5.2.17  3:01 pm   What is an instrument you never want to learn to play?

     i wish i could name something just to test how quickly someone says "what do you have against _____" just to illustrate why i can't answer questions like these

5.2.17  2:59 pm   you like art but say science is 'ok', and also say that science and art are the same if you want to have fun. does this mean you do not want to have fun?

     science and art are both ok and i like them both. and they might as well be the same, if you want to have fun. i'm not sure if that answers your question

5.2.17  2:17 pm   what are your thoughts on the differences between pens and pencils?

     pencils are usually eraseable, pens are usually not. that is the main difference
5.2.17  2:16 pm   do you have the ability to completely disregard questions?
